# Innovation Management Framework
Innovation management systematically promotes innovation within organizations.
Key elements:
1. Idea Generation: Structured brainstorming and ideation processes
2. Evaluation Criteria: Assess feasibility and potential impact
3. Implementation Pipeline: Stage-gate process for development
4. Resource Allocation: Budget and team assignment
5. Performance Metrics: ROI, time-to-market, adoption rates
Successful innovation requires balancing creativity with systematic execution.
